fields.name: Perception (Passive):
fields.value: You will not attack targets that ~~are death immune~~ *have defense* or are guarded by the (1795) ToL Knight.

fields.name: Mage Armor (Passive):
fields.value:
~~Immune to death~~ *Basic Defense* (at night) and bleeding.

Walking Bomb (Day) Cast a deadly spell on target player that you can later detonate. Can have multiple Walking Bombs active. Usable Day 1.
- Cannot target King.

fields.name: Escape Fate (Day, 1 Use):
fields.value: Escape an accusation of treason with a pardon.

fields.name: Magic Missile (Night):
fields.value: Attack target player by firing a Magic Missile.

fields.name: Detonate (Night):
fields.value: Kills all players with an active Walking Bomb. ~~Bypasses death immunity.~~ *Deals Powerful Attacks.*
